1.content: Great! This really helps visualize our ideas.

2.content: I agree! Can't wait to start developing it.

3.content: Wait! Before that, we need to test our ideas!

5.content: Yes! Remember the user problems we defined in the first two stages? We need to make sure our solution tackles those problems efficiently.

6.content: Without testing, we run the risk of developing a product that does not help the user.

7.content: This would not only frustrate users, but also waste precious time and effort spent on major re-works!

8.content: That makes sense...major re-works are always very time-consuming.

9.content: How can we mitigate that then?

10.content: We can perform something called usability testing!
